message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. How about $105? I'm really interested in this product.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're willing to spend a bit less, but I'm not willing to go as low as $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $112.50. Let me know if that works for you!
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $112.50 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm happy to go up to $110.  Let me know if that works for you.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $113. Let's meet somewhere in the middle!
